ISSUE.TITLE: Stock management issue for products with non-combinable attributes
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Open our "Custom T-Shirt" sample product. It has a text attribute 2. In admin area the quantity is set to a "9985" and "Track Inventory" dropdownlist value selected 3. Enter your text as 1 and quantity as 9985 (the current max value allowed ) then Add to cart 4. Enter your text as 2 and quantity as 9985 (the current max value allowed ) then Add to cart 5. Now the customer can order more stock than stock quantity Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/82380/create-negative-stock-quantity-adding-items-to-cart-with-different-attributes Let's decide how we should better manage stock for products with non-combinable attributes (no way to create combinations)
